name: PER Battle System 2.0
description:
I didn't have a lot of time to make something complete, but I worked extensively on the Battle System to give folks some Ideas on how to go about their game! This is a Action Battle System that is turned on and off by holding the [Space] Key. 

   There are 4 enemies that respawn, and respawn faster as you take them down in a short tutorial of the system. The idea is to use space, and time your shots in the right environment without getting overrun!
